Class Command<R>

java.lang.Object
utils.Command<R>
Type Parameters:
R - The return type of the BiFunction that handles the command
public class Command<R> extends Object
Command class to be stored in commands of CommandHandler

    • execute

      public R execute(Server.ClientHandler client, String[] inpList)
      Executes the BiFunction commandHandler with client and inpList as params
      Parameters:
      client - The ClientHandler instance that initiated the command
      inpList - The list containing strings obtained from splitting the message string from the client
